name: The Legend of ice Soul -Demo (ouya)
description:
this Game demo and just run on console  ouya not other phones

the legend of ice soul it's a Puzzle Game with amazing tiles and sprites

style pixel art. the legend of ice soul it's a Puzzle Game with amazing tiles and sprites style pixel art. The task is to extinguish the fire But it is not so easy with very difficult puzzles that increase with the passage of stages good luck ... .
